TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BuildManager extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides a set of methods to help manage the compilation of an ASP.NET application.

span.span: Provides a set of methods to help manage the compilation of an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別管理的程序編譯的組件和應用程式的頁面。The class manages the process of compiling assemblies and pages for an application. 它是密封的類別，而且無法被繼承。It is a sealed class and cannot be inherited. 包含靜態成員，可以提供已編譯的組件的相關資訊。 contains static members that provide information about the compiled assemblies.

static member AddCompilationDependency : string -> unit

param.name: dependency
param.span: A string that represents a dependency.

span.span: A string that represents a dependency.

summary.span: Specifies a string that represents a dependency that the build manager uses to help determine if a clean build is required.

span.span: Specifies a string that represents a dependency that the build manager uses to help determine if a clean build is required.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須呼叫此方法期間`Application_PreStartInit`階段的應用程式。The method must be called during the `Application_PreStartInit` stage of the application.

exception.span: The parameter is or an empty string.

span.span: The parameter is or an empty string.

exception.span: The method was called after the stage of the application.

span.span: The method was called after the stage of the application.

param.span: The assembly to add.

span.span: The assembly to add.

summary.span: Adds an assembly to the application's set of referenced assemblies.

span.span: Adds an assembly to the application's set of referenced assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法相當於將組件加入至應用程式層級的 Web.config 檔案。Calling this method is equivalent to adding the assembly to the application-level Web.config file. 必須呼叫此方法期間`Application_PreStartInit`階段的應用程式。The method must be called during the `Application_PreStartInit` stage of the application. 方法會傳回一組由組態檔的組件和任何使用這個方法所加入的組件。The method will return the set of assemblies that are determined from configuration files and any assemblies that were added by using this method. 如果嘗試加入已加入的組件，則會忽略重複的項目。If an attempt is made to add an assembly that has already been added, the duplicate entry is ignored. 之前，必須呼叫此方法`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中的事件，就會發生。This method must be called before the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file occurs.

span.span: The parameter is or empty.

exception.span: The method was not called before the event in the Global.asax file occurred.

span.span: The method was not called before the event in the Global.asax file occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Nullable<bool> BatchCompilationEnabled { get; set; }
.property valuetype System.Nullable`1<bool> BatchCompilationEnabled
Public Shared Property BatchCompilationEnabled As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: static property Nullable<bool> BatchCompilationEnabled { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether batch compilation is enabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether batch compilation is enabled.

value.span: 如果永遠啟用批次編譯，如果永遠不會啟用批次編譯，或如果編譯設定的判定方式從組態檔。

span.span: if batch compilation is always enabled, if batch compilation is never enabled, or if the compilation setting is determined from the configuration file.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓您開啟或關閉的批次編譯以程式設計的方式。This property enables you to turn batch compilation on or off programmatically. 它會對應至`batch`屬性`compilation`Web.config 檔案中的項目。It corresponds to the `batch` attribute of the `compilation` element in the Web.config file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[compilation 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12)。For more information, see [compilation Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c319582-074a-4d2a-a787-03b9d4541c12). 這個屬性可以設定只有在`PreApplicationStart`方法。The property can be set only in the `PreApplicationStart` method. 如需 `PreApplicationStart` 方法的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about the `PreApplicationStart` method, see .

exception.span: The property was not set in the method.

span.span: The property was not set in the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法和方法可讓您執行快取保存跨網域重新啟動應用程式在部分信任環境中。This method and the method enable you to perform caching that persists across application domain restarts in partial-trust environments. 它會使用 MVC 架構控制器查閱快取結果。It is used by the MVC framework to cache results of the controller lookup. 快取資料，您將寫入這個方法所傳回的物件。To cache data, you write to the object that is returned by this method.

summary.span: Returns a build dependency set for a virtual path if the path is located in the ASP.NET cache, even if the content is not current.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ensureIsUpToDate`參數值設定為`true`、方法多載的行為類似方法多載。If the `ensureIsUpToDate` parameter value is set to `true`, the method overload behaves like the method overload. 這兩個多載會傳回目前的組建相依性，如果有的話，請設定，否則它們會傳回`null`。Both overloads return a current build dependency set if one exists, otherwise they return `null`. 不過，方法多載包含選項，以傳回任何建置相依性集合，可使用，即使過期的一個。However, the method overload includes the option to return any build dependency set that is available, even an outdated one. 如果`ensureIsUpToDate`參數值設定為`false`，則方法會傳回任何可用的組建相依性集合。If the `ensureIsUpToDate` parameter value is set to `false`, the method will return any available build dependency set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從傳回的組件集合方法包含在其他最上層資料夾中的 Web.config 檔案的項目中指定組件、 從自訂程式碼在 App_Code 目錄中，所建立的組件和組件。The collection of assemblies that is returned from the method includes assemblies specified in the element of the Web.config file, assemblies built from custom code in the App_Code directory, and assemblies in other top-level folders. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [.NET Framework 版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [.NET Framework Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

value.span: 目前的 Web 站台的.NET framework 目標版本。

span.span: The target version of the .NET Framework for the current Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性支援 ASP.NET 多目標功能，可讓您使用最新版本的 Visual Studio 來開發應用程式在其中執行具有較早版本的.NET Framework。This property supports the ASP.NET multi-targeting feature, which enables you to use the latest version of Visual Studio to develop applications that will run with earlier versions of the .NET Framework. 組建提供者可以使用這個屬性，並確定在提供者產生程式碼適用於.NET Framework 目標版本。A build provider can use this property to make sure that the provider generates code that is appropriate for the targeted version of the .NET Framework. 例如，您可以產生不同的程式碼取決於是否網站目標[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]。For example, you might want to generate different code depending on whether a Web site targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 如需多目標功能的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 專案的.NET Framework 多目標](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76)。For more information about multi-targeting, see [.NET Framework Multi-Targeting for ASP.NET Web Projects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b8145a9-62f6-4fc4-8a83-47b0487cbe76). 如果網站沒有 Web.config 檔，ASP.NET 會假設目標 framework 版本為 IIS 應用程式集區下執行的站台相關聯的版本。If the Web site does not have a Web.config file, ASP.NET assumes that the target framework version is the version that is associated with the IIS application pool that the site is running under. 檔案系統網站上執行 Visual Studio 中，預設的 framework 版本是最新版.NET Framework。For a file-system Web site that is running in Visual Studio, the default framework version is the current version of the .NET Framework. 如果網站沒有 Web.config 檔，ASP.NET 會檢查 Web.config 檔案來判斷目標架構。If the Web site does have a Web.config file, ASP.NET determines the target framework by examining the Web.config file. ## .NET Framework 2.0 為目標的 Web SitesWeb Sites that Target the .NET Framework 2.0 Web 應用程式目標[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]好像目標編譯[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]。Web applications that target the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] are compiled as if the target were the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]. 在建置程序不會區分[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]因為其中一個版本為目標時，Web.config 檔案並不表示編譯器版本或目標 framework。The build process does not differentiate between the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] because the Web.config file does not indicate compiler version or target framework when one of those versions is targeted. (如[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]，Web.config 檔案指定的編譯器版本，以及[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，Web.config 檔案中指定的目標 framework。)因此，針對 Web 應用程式目標[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，這個屬性會傳回指出目標 framework moniker [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]。(For the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)], the Web.config file specifies the compiler version, and for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the Web.config file specifies the target framework.) Therefore, for Web applications that target the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], this property returns a target framework moniker that indicates the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]. 這通常不會造成任何問題。This normally will not cause any problems. Visual Studio 會讓您建立參考[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]設為目標的專案中的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。Visual Studio prevents you from creating references to [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] features in a project that is targeted for the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]. 例如，Visual Studio 不提供項目範本設為目標的專案中的 WCF 服務[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，因為 WCF 引進[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和不相容[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。For example, Visual Studio does not provide item templates for WCF services in a project that is targeted for [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], because WCF was introduced with the [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]. 如果您打算將網站部署[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]執行階段環境，而且您使用參考功能只與相容的 Visual Studio 以外工具[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]，而不會產生錯誤或警告可能會建置專案。If you plan to deploy a Web site in a [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] run-time environment and you use a tool other than Visual Studio to reference features that are compatible only with [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)], the project might build without generating errors or warnings. 不過，應用程式可能會產生錯誤的網站上執行時[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。However, the application might generate errors when the Web site runs on the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
